mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.dw_id AS "dwId", a.app_no AS "appNo", a.loan_bill_no AS "loanBillNo", a.repay_date AS "repayDate", a.principal AS "principal", a.interest AS "interest", a.fee AS "fee", a.penalty AS "penalty", a.compound AS "compound", a.late_fee AS "lateFee", a.prepay_fee AS "prepayFee", a.pay_account_fee AS "payAccountFee", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wsxd_repay_hst( id, dw_id, app_no, loan_bill_no, repay_date, principal, interest, fee, penalty, compound, late_fee, prepay_fee, pay_account_fee, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dwId}, #{appNo}, #{loanBillNo}, #{repayDate}, #{principal}, #{interest}, #{fee}, #{penalty}, #{compound}, #{lateFee}, #{prepayFee}, #{payAccountFee}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wsxd_repay_hst SET dw_id = #{dwId}, app_no = #{appNo}, loan_bill_no = #{loanBillNo}, repay_date = #{repayDate}, principal = #{principal}, interest = #{interest}, fee = #{fee}, penalty = #{penalty}, compound = #{compound}, late_fee = #{lateFee}, prepay_fee = #{prepayFee}, pay_account_fee = #{payAccountFee}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.loan_bill_no AS loanBillNo, a.repay_date AS repayDate, SUM((IFNULL(a.principal,0) + IFNULL(a.interest,0) + IFNULL(a.fee,0) + IFNULL(a.penalty,0) + IFNULL(a.compound,0) + IFNULL(a.late_fee,0) + IFNULL(a.prepay_fee ,0)+ IFNULL(a.pay_account_fee,0))) AS repayMoney FROM wsxd_repay_hst a WHERE a.loan_bill_no = #{loanBillNo} AND a.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY a.repay_date
